title: Heritage Polki Pendant with Diamond Halo - "Vaibhavam" Collection
features: A regal, square pendant featuring a large, central uncut Polki diamond (Phanna). The Polki is surrounded by a halo of smaller, brilliant-cut diamonds, creating a stunning contrast between the raw beauty of the Polki and the sparkle of the modern cuts. The gold setting showcases a delicate floral design with a fine Hyderabadi polish, adding to its antique charm and lending a unique South Indian touch.
occasions: Traditional events like Seemantham and other auspicious occasions where a statement piece is desired.
description: This pendant is a true testament to South Indian heritage jewelry. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it an unparalleled vintage appeal, while the brilliant-cut diamond halo adds a touch of modern elegance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster, and the design carries cultural significance and symbolizes prosperity. The perfect heirloom piece to cherish for generations.
